EmailTemplate.name: BB Youth Board 15/16 NCS ACTION DAY REMINDER
EmailTemplate.subject: Youth Board Session Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}!
This is a quick email to remind you of our upcoming meeting on Tuesday 1st March @ 5pm.
As usual, the meeting place will be the New Eltham Methodist Church: 435-439 Footscray Road, New Eltham, London SE9 3UL
Your youth board mentor for the day will be Stephanie.
The session will be focussing purchasing all the items that will be in the packs and any finishing touches for the event on Saturday!
You will also be receiving your NCS action day party ticket at the meeting!
Look out for the reminder text and we will see you there!
Best,
Bromley and Bexley team
